description: Query relevance evaluation for RAG system testing - manual ground truth annotations

queries.query: When was the last time I talked to Jayant, and what did we discuss?
queries.expected_answer: March 25, 2024 - discussed prior case with not being read in around Artemis causing headaches, and long prompt

relevant_documents.reason: Person page with profile info
Contains the 1x1 meeting notes with Jayant

queries.notes: Smart search returned Jayant person page quickly. Grep for '#meetings/1x1' pattern confirmed March 25, 2024 was the last 1x1.

queries.query: I had a meeting with Brian, and he asked about evals for photo styles, where's the link to the disc hub page for that?

relevant_documents.reason: Contains the Discovery Hub link for photo styles eval
Hub page for photo styles program

queries.notes: November 20, 2025 note explicitly mentions 'photo style understanding model eval is up in discovery Hub' with the link.

queries.query: Who was working on the transformer based relevance improvements to AdobeOne?
queries.expected_answer: Feng bin - has a project to fine tune AdobeOne V2 for failure cases, transformer based ranking

relevant_documents.reason: Contains mention of Feng bin's transformer-based ranking project

queries.notes: Found in Ritu 1x1 meeting notes on November 19, 2025.

queries.initial_search_query: PsM PM Photoshop Mobile product manager

relevant_documents.reason: Person page explicitly stating 'Photoshop Mobile PM'
Contains PM contact info for Photoshop

queries.notes: Michael Lewis person page and Photoshop.md both provide this answer.

queries.query: Who should I ping for a question about Lr desktop?
additional_queries_needed: LrD Lr Desktop contact Rithesh Vic Anuj
queries.expected_answer: Peter Baust - Group PM manager for Lightroom

relevant_documents.reason: Person page - Group PM manager for Lightroom
Hub page for Lightroom program
Desktop rollout planning page

queries.notes: Peter Baust is listed as Group PM manager for Lightroom. For technical contacts, Chhaya's work on embeddings is also mentioned in Lr Desktop Rollout.md.

queries.query: What is the current LrD rollout date for semantic search?
queries.initial_search_query: LrD semantic search rollout date desktop April 2026

relevant_documents.reason: States 'Targeting April 2026'
Contains link to LrD GA April 2026 wiki

queries.notes: Both Lr Desktop Rollout.md and Lr Home.md confirm April 2026 target.

queries.query: What are the Q1 Must nails?
queries.expected_answer: Recs: Styles (icons/design assets, photo model), PsW stock content, DC Recs 100% rollout. Lr: LrD query strategy & migration plan. Intent/QU: Use case in prod (CKG4 + New MM model)

relevant_documents.reason: Contains detailed Q1 2026 Must Nails section
References Q1 Must Nails via transclusion
References Q1 Must Nails via transclusion

queries.notes: November 18, 2025 is the canonical source with the structured list.

queries.query: When was my last 1x1 with Ayush?
queries.expected_answer: November 13, 2025 - discussed stopping modeling and working on more generalized approach, golden set for MM swimlane 3 isn't correct

relevant_documents.reason: Contains the most recent Ayush 1x1 meeting
Person page

queries.notes: Grep confirmed November 13, 2025 as most recent. Smart search ranked October 22, 2025 higher due to ranking - needed grep to find correct answer.

queries.query: What is the latest on PsW Recs?
queries.initial_search_query: PsW Recs Photoshop Web Recommendations status
queries.expected_answer: PsW stock content is Q1 2026 must nail. POC use cases include preset adjustments and subject/background manipulation. PM contacts: Hao Xu, Jasper. Slack: ps-web-in-context-recommendation

relevant_documents.reason: Hub page with PsW Recs details, use cases, PM contacts
Q1 Must Nails listing PsW stock content
Kosta 1x1 mentions Ps Web recs priority over mobile
Brian meeting notes about not spending cycles on Ps Mobile

queries.notes: Photoshop.md serves as the hub page with comprehensive info. Recent daily notes provide current status.

queries.query: Is the new MM model done? Anywhere I can test it?
queries.initial_search_query: new MM model multi-modal testing status demo
additional_queries_needed: MintV2 multi-modal model demo devbox test
queries.expected_answer: Not done - roadmap targets production-ready service by November 28, 2025. Demo links available: Asset to GT demo and Context to GT demo on devbox. Current architecture uses AdobeOneV1 encoder + Llama-1.8B decoder.

relevant_documents.path: Clippings/Work/Multi-modal Intent and Content Understanding wiki.md
relevant_documents.reason: Contains roadmap with November 28, 2025 target date
Contains devbox demo links
Multi Modal intent detection meeting with technical details
Overview page linking to wiki and October 14 notes
Q1 Must Nails mentions CKG4 + New MM model in prod

queries.notes: Demo links in Intent AI Home: Asset to GT demo (https://session-8cb5d010-b1dc-48ff-8f80-596ea66fdbd8.devbox.training.adobesensei.io/test_port/), Context to GT demo (https://session-c52bfcf5-7fdb-4766-ae6d-7f01ca1d48d7.devbox.training.adobesensei.io/flask/)

observations: Smart search excels at finding hub pages and person pages
Temporal queries (last 1x1) sometimes miss most recent due to ranking vs grep accuracy
Multi-hop queries (who works on X) require following graph connections
Abbreviations (PsM, LrD, MM) are well-handled by alias expansion
